ARABIC: أَلَمْ يَعْلَمُوٓا۟ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَعْلَمُ سِرَّهُمْ وَنَجْوَىٰهُمْ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَلَّٰمُ ٱلْغُيُوبِ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Do they not know that Allah knows their secrets and their private talk, and that Allah is the Knower of all unseen things?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Have they not realised that God knows their secrets and their confidential talk, and that God has the knowledge of unknown things?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Are they not aware that Allah knows what they conceal and what they secretly discuss, and that Allah has full knowledge even of all that is beyond the reach of perception.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Were they not aware that God knows all that they hide or whisper and that He has absolute knowledge of the unseen?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Do they not know that Allah knows their secrets and the schemes they whisper, and that Allah is the All Knowing of all the hidden?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Know they not that Allah knows their secret ideas, and their Najwa (secret counsels), and that Allah is the All-Knower of things unseen.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Do they not know that Allah knows their hidden thoughts and their secret counsels, and that Allah is the great Knower of the unseen things?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Did they not know that God knows their secret and what they conspire together, and that God knows the things unseen?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Know they not that Allah knoweth both their secret and the thought that they confide, and that Allah is the Knower of Things Hidden?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Do they not know that God knows what they conceal and what they talk about in secret? That God knows all that is hidden?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Knew they not that Allah knoweth their secret and their Whisper, and that Allah is the Knower of Things Hidden!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Do they not know that Allah knows their secret [thoughts] and [hears] their secret talks, and that Allah is knower of all that is Unseen?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Know they not that Allah doth know their secret (thoughts) and their secret counsels, and that Allah knoweth well all things unseen?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Know they not that Allah knows their secret ideas, and their Najwa (secret counsels), and that Allah is the All-Knower of the unseen.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Did they not know that Allah knows their secret and what they conspire together, and that Allah knows all the unseen?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Do they not know that God knows their secrets and their conspiracies? And that God is the Knower of the unseen?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Did they not know that Allah knows their secrets and their private conversations and that Allah is the Knower of the unseen?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [9:78]   Did they, the hypocrites, not know that God knows their secret, what they conceal within themselves, and their confidential talks, what they confide in each other, and that God is the Knower of the hidden things?, what is concealed from the eyes.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Know they not) i.e. the hypocrites (that Allah knoweth both their secret) that which is between them (and the thought that they confide) when they are alone, (and that Allah is the Knower of Things Hidden) from His servants?
